Question.TranslatedText: Check all known medical conditions you have or currently have. If none apply or the conditions are unknown, do not check any.
Parental medical history: Check all known conditions that pertain to your biological mother or father. If none apply or the conditions are unknown, do not check any.
Have you traveled to any of the following countries in the last 10 years? Check all countries you have visited.
This study requires your consent because there are risks associated. These risks include possibility of exposure to: ipsum lorem.
Do you wish to participate in the study?

Veterans Hospital wants to ensure you are aware of all possible risks associated with participating in the WISE study. The study requires certain policies and procedures be followed in the event you can no longer provide consent. These procedures may or may not lead to your ipsum lorem...
Do you consent to participate in the study as outlined by the VH?
Can we use email as the primary means of communication?
